inclusion.criterion: Lumbar puncture within 24 hours of arrival to the ED
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: performed in the ED or inpatient, within 24 hours of arrival

inclusion.criterion: Parent is able to read English or Spanish
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: A provider who is trained in the use of the Compass device is willing and able to use it during the LP
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Child is a foster child or ward of the state or is unaccompanied by their legal guardian
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: The child is pregnant, by verbal report or clinically available test results
exclusion.label: unknown
